channel.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
channel.description: Hello, i recently put up a server and im wondering how i can edit and add my own commands. Does anyone know how to do this? I also want to modify who can make othe other players mod/admin through command. how can i do that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 10:01:14 PM[/size][hr]nobody?

item.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
item.dc:creator: @whosdr whosdr
item.description:
@whosdr wrote:

these are a few other lines

addItem (itemID,itemAmmount);
addItem (995, 1000000); (1m coins)
setAnimation (number 1-3500 aprox this is the same as ::emote command so dont go over id 3500);
like
setAnimation (1501);
teleToX = X coord
teleToY = Y coord

teleToX = 3333;
teleToY = 3333;
heightLevel = 0;
heightLevel = height Level
this one is different for each servers but
makeGlobalObject (X coord(or absX), (y coord or absY), object ID, height level, 10);

so example is

teleToX = 3333;
teleToY = 3333;
heightLevel = 0;
makeGlobalObject (absX, absY, 1107, 0, 10);//chair at your pos
absX means your X posision.
absY means your Y posision
objectX and objectY would be objects posision

addItem (995, 1000000); //(1m coins)
setAnimation (1501);//(god animation)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i edit or even make my own commands?

item.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
item.dc:creator: @Busta_Blader Busta Blader
item.description:
@Busta_Blader wrote:

With Nakes example you can copy that and edit it for a whole new command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("boat")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 1887; teleportToY = 4825; sendMessage("You Teleport To The Boat!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: How can i edit or even make my own commands?

item.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
item.dc:creator: @Lagex Lagex
item.description:
@Lagex wrote:

Add this into your client.java for some fun ;D

if (command.startsWith("havesex")) { actiontimer = 0; sendMessage("Don't hesitate! Get in there!"); p.emote = takeshirtoff; p.emote = takepantsoff; p.emote = takeboxersoff; updateAppearance = true; setEmote = doggystyle; sendMessage("This is fun!");

Read full topic
item.source: How can i edit or even make my own commands?

item.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
item.dc:creator: @nake nake
item.description:
@nake wrote:

okay here is an example

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2725; teleportToY = 3486; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } }

this is the commands name

}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
you replace home with what ever you want.

this is what command do!
replace the cords and the mesage and you have a new home command!

if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 2725; teleportToY = 3486; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } }

thats how you modify a command but is just basic commands!
there are lots of other thing a command could do you just have to learn how to make them.

You add this if you want only an admin to use this comman

}else  if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home"))&& playerRights >= 2) {

item.title: How can i edit or even make my own commands?
item.dc:creator: @crystalscape crystalscape
item.description:
@crystalscape wrote:

lol easy. you can make yourself admin in characters file click your file and ull see character-rights = 0 change the 0 to a 3. but make sure ur logged out. then log in and wala =) same goes for making them admin/ mod on mod is 1 edit whatever you want to through files not all in same place.

hidden admin/ 4
admin/3
real mod/2
mod/1
reg player/0
